author: aheritier
msg: New goal plugins:repository-install-all to call the reactor on all plugins with the goal plugin:repository-install

author: bago
msg: Refactored POP3Handler to follow the same pattern of the SMTPHandler (JAMES-487)
Currently POP3Handler uses its own POP3Session, its own POP3HandlerChain and its own CommandHandler and ConnectHandler interfaces: we'll create common interfaces later.

author: ab
msg: Add the following tools (see also NUTCH-264):
* CrawlDbMerger: merges one or more crawldb-s, with optional filtering
* LinkDbMerger: merges one or more linkdb-s, with optional filtering
* SegmentMerger: merges one or more segments, with optional filtering
Development of these tools has been sponsored by houxou.com - thank you!

author: ab
msg: Refactor to make it easier to use these classes programmatically.
